Body: Description: I deployed the EPP agent thru a Hexnode policy I created. The agent installed. On the server, his computer pops up, but his "Users" username doesn't pop up. Why is this happening? I've never seen this happen before

What We've Learned Updated: The reported problem was caused by a licensing issue(one computer was registered multiple times and consumed all licenses). We have deleted the computer from Device Control and the newly deployed device start working.
